g.text: Microsoft 365 Business Basicdoes not include Windows
Microsoft 365 Business Standarddoes not include Windows
FastTrack helps customers deploy Microsoft 365. Customers with 150+ eligible licenses can use FastTrack at no additional cost for the life of their subscription.
Microsoft 365 Business Basicdoes not include EMS
Microsoft 365 Business Standarddoes not include EMS

a.text: Microsoft 365 Business Premium includes Windows Pro upgrade from earlier Pro versions + Universal Print
